title: macOS 15.2 breaks the ability to copy the OS to another drive
dot: digraph ShirtPocketWatch{graph[rankdir=TB, bgcolor=lightgrey];node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=white, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];main[label="Shirt Pocket Watch: macOS 15.2 Issues", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightblue];issue[label="Issue: Resource Busy Error", shape=box];cause[label="Cause: Apple broke the replicator", shape=box];workaround[label="Workaround: Use 'Backup - all files' with 'Smart Update'", shape=box];feedback[label="Feedback: Bug FB16090831", shape=box];conclusion[label="Conclusion: Apple needs to fix the issue", shape=box];main->issue;issue->cause;issue->workaround;issue->feedback;feedback->conclusion;context[label="Context: Holiday Season, Limited Updates", shape=box, style=dashed];main->context;}
